English:
This is a fantastic dive into the mind of The Matrix series, taking you through the ideas behind each film, one by one. A gaggle of philosophers (most of them university professors) and science-fiction authors (including Bruce Sterling and John Shirley) revel in their enjoyment of the chaos of influences and ideas that make the films so rich behind the kung-fu and action sequences.
Key quote in this documentary: "It's the perfect movie to build a philosophy course around. You come away from this documentary admiring the Wachowskis' extraordinary ambition in embarking on a project with such enormous intellectual scope.
